pv36:4.2: ambasakkaro → ambasakkharo (bj, s2, s3, pts1-2) | appasakkaro (mr)
pv36:15.1: Addhā paṭiññā me tadā ahu → paṭiññātametaṃ tadāhu (mr) | paṭiññā na mete tadā ahu (?)
pv36:17.5: Sabbampi akkhissaṃ → sabbaṃ ācikkhissaṃ (bj) | sabbaṃ akkhissaṃ (s2, s3, pts1-2)
pv36:19.1: Vesāliyā nagarassa → tassa nagarassa (bj, s2, s3, pts1-2)
pv36:40.3: majja → samajja (bj, pts1-2) | sa majja (s2, s3)
pv36:49.3: bhijjanti ca te → bhijjanti tava (s2, s3, mr)
pv36:54.2: Tappaccayā vāpi → tappaccayā tāhaṃ (bj, pts2) | tappaccayā cāhaṃ (pts1)
pv36:62.3: neva maṃ lacchasi → teneva maṃ na lacchasi (bj) | teneva maṃ licchavi (s2, s3, pts1) | teneva maṃ na lacchasi (pts2) | teneva maṃ lacchasi (mr)
pv36:73.2: Teneva saha → tena samaṃ (bj) | tena saha (s2, s3, mr)
pv36:80.5: Imañca ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgavarenupetaṃ → imañca aṭṭhaṅgavaraṃ upetaṃ (s2, s3, pts1)
pv36:81.6: vippasannena cetasā → sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati (s2, s3, mr)
pv36:83.3: Muñca tuvaṃ → mucceyya so tvaṃ (bj, pts2, mr) | mucceyya so (s2, s3) | muñca so tvaṃ (pts1)
pv36:87.3: vikampāmi → vikappāmi (bj, pts2) | vikkappāmi (s2, s3, pts1)
